meanings.definition: The state of being separate or distinct from others.
meanings.sent1: The apartnesses of the two islands made them seem like worlds apart.
meanings.sent2: The apartnesses of the colors in the painting created a striking contrast.
meanings.sent3: The apartnesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The apartnesses of the stars in the night sky gave a sense of vastness.
meanings.sent5: The apartnesses of the different species in the forest highlighted their uniqueness.

meanings.definition: The quality of being isolated or detached from something else.
meanings.sent1: The apartnesses of the hermit's cabin in the woods added to its mysterious aura.
meanings.sent2: The apartnesses of the old house from the town made it feel eerie.
meanings.sent3: The apartnesses of the lone tree on the hill made it a favorite spot for picnics.
meanings.sent4: The apartnesses of the protagonist from society reflected in his introspective nature.
meanings.sent5: The apartnesses of the small island from the mainland gave it a sense of tranquility.
